original_text: They are always saying bad things against people, because they want to cause trouble for them. 3: See Psalm 10:7. sentences.original_text: They are always saying bad things against people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 언제나 사람들에게 나쁜 말을 합니다

sentences.original_text: because they want to cause trouble for them
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 그들에게 곤란을 주고 싶어하기 때문입니다
